casebody.data:
In re I.D.G. No. 118PA08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 5, 2009. Elizabeth M. Boone, Jackson, MS, for Gaston County DSS. Heather Adams, for Guardian ad Litem.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th day of March 2008 by Respondent (Father) to Stay Filing of Response Pending Court's Ruling:

"Motion Dismissed as Moot by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of February 2009."
